DOC.detailed_description: Patient Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria : 1 . New York Heart Association Class II/III HF preserve ejection fraction ( EF ) > 50 % . 2 . Nonsmokers 3 . Subject take Coumadin , Xarelto , Prasugrel Pradaxa . Patients Plavix drug elute stent exclude . 4 . Ages 40-65 . We exclude woman child bear potential
